data.text: @ChiefLeBourdais Have been on that highway on Greyhound bus on more than one occasion where I just put my head down and held my breath, expecting any minute to go over the edge. Thankfully some excellent drivers kept us on the highway Fog at times, terrible.

@ChiefLeBourdais @DesConrad A scary stretch if foggy, rainy as you describe and snowy or just icy. Had one trip from Kamloops to Vancouver where it was so foggy until Hope, was seriously worried about driving off the road or coming upon an accident without warning. Glad you're home safely.
@ChiefLeBourdais @DesConrad I'll see this next year on Highway Thru hell
